Subject: MLP Project: cotton production data Pakistan

 

Hi Saber,

 

Hope this email finds you well!

 

I wanted to ask for support to create a new production dataset that captures bi-weekly cotton production statistics from Pakistan.

 

The historical files (and future reports) are published in pdf format in the following link:

 

https://www.pcga.org/arrival-reports/

 

From the reports, we only need 3 values (highlighted in red below in the latest report)

 

Total Arrivals Punjab (in bales)

Total Arrivals Sindh (in bales)

Total Arrivals Pakistan (in bales)

 



 

 

Let me know please if this is feasible, happy to jump in a call if there’s any questions.

 

Regards
